alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:01AM CDT until May 09 at 12:43AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Spring River near Quapaw affecting Ottawa County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring River near Quapaw. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, recreational areas near the gage site are inundated to a depth of several feet. The gage site may be cut off from easy access. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
